members.name: Fred Bloggs
members.bio: Stop asking me for a bio, I have a job for christsake. Do you even know who I am? I'm not Stephen Spielberg, but my god am I the premier Stephen Spielberg lookalike, I'm so good I pretended to be him and directed 5 movies before anybody even suspected a thing.

members.name: Joey Bloppers
members.bio: If you keep pestering me for a bio, I am going to get you sacked. While you're here, can you buy some burgers? I mean at Burger Thing we are really, really, struggling, I mean who even goes to Burger Thing?! Where even are any of the Burger Things? Have you seen one? Cuz I haven't and I work there.
